attributes.action: Kate Mccann should not be an ambassador for missing people
attributes.additional_details: we the undersigned would like the home office to take action to remove kate mccann from her role as ambassador for missing people. the countries reputation and trust could be affected long term if she is not removed from the position. kate mccann left 3 babies alone in a foreign country on several nights whilst out drinking. the madeleine mccann case is currently shelved and not closed and the evidence so far gathered has not suggested despite reports that kate mccann is innocent in the cover up of her missing daughter. until this case is solved it is wrong to promote kate mccann as an ambassador for missing people.
